items.title: When will I see the results?
items.content: The micro-infusion treatment serves as a highly efficient skin-enhancing procedure, yielding a noticeable increase in radiance, a reduction in fine lines, and an overall refreshed complexion within the following day or two. Engaging in multiple sessions enhances these skin benefits progressively over time. This swift and user-friendly home facial is particularly well-suited for perform one or two days before important events, ensuring a heightened boost to your skin's complexion when it matters most.

items.title: How often can I do the treatment?
items.content: We recommend a Micro-Infusion treatment every 2 weeks for the best results!

items.title: Does it hurt?
items.content: The sensation is similar to a minor pinprick, and it's virtually painless. The ultra-fine needles, measuring a mere 0.5mm in length and thinner than human hair, ensure a treatment experience with minimal discomfort. While there might be a slight initial unease or occasional pinprick, users tend to react to the sensation swiftly as they starting the treatment.

items.title: When is the best time to do micro-infusion?
items.content: We suggest performing the treatment in the evening before bedtime. It is advisable to refrain from sun exposure and makeup application for the following 24 hours post-treatment.

items.title: What are the serum ingredients?
items.content: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Copper Tripeptide-1, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sclerotium Gum, Sodium DNA(PDRN), Saccharide Isomerate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Lycium Barbarum Callus (Goji Exosome) Culture Extract, Isomalt, Lecithin, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid

items.title: Can you use it around the eyes, lips and on the neck?
items.content: If you're wondering whether you can use the Micro Infusion System (MIS) around your eyes, lips, and neck, the answer is yes! Using MIS is an excellent method for addressing eye bags, wrinkles, fine lines, and saggy skin. It's safe to use on any areas of your skin that require extra attention.

landing_faqs.answer: Hydration and glow from first use. Visible firming and wrinkle reduction in 4-6 weeks. Dramatic transformation by week 8-12.
landing_faqs.question: When will I see results?

landing_faqs.answer: Mild tingling that fades in seconds. Safe and painless. Much gentler than professional microneedling.
landing_faqs.question: Does it hurt?

landing_faqs.answer: The blue color comes from Copper Tripeptide-1 (GHK-Cu). This is proof of authentic, properly concentrated copper peptide. Beware of colorless 'copper peptide' products.

landing_faqs.answer: Yes! All three ingredients have anti-inflammatory properties. This formula is excellent for sensitive, rosacea-prone, or post-procedure skin.

Professional clinic treatments can address deeper layers, but are expensive, time-consuming, and often require recovery time. Our Micro-Infusion System bridges the gap by allowing advanced actives to be delivered more effectively than traditional skincare, without needles, surgery, or clinic visits.

landing_pages.hero_static_content: Our Micro-Infusion System combines precision delivery and advanced bioactives traditionally found in clinical settings, now accessible for safe, at-home use. Using ultra-fine titanium 0.5 mm microneedles, this system creates microscopic channels in the skinâ€™s surface to enhance the delivery of a powerful serum blend â€” including Sodium DNA, Goji Stem-Cell Exosomes, Copper Tripeptide, and Oligo-HA â€” rebuild smoother, firmer, more radiant skin with minimal discomfort and no downtime.

landing_pages.hero_static_content: Our Micro-Infusion System combines precision delivery and advanced bioactives traditionally found in clinical settings, now accessible for safe, at-home use. Using ultra-fine titanium 0.5 mm microneedles, this system creates microscopic channels in the skinâ€™s surface to enhance the delivery of a powerful serum blend â€” including Sodium DNA, Goji Stem-Cell Exosomes, Copper Tripeptide, and Oligo-HA â€” rebuild smoother, firmer, more radiant skin with minimal discomfort and no downtime.

steps.text_content:
1. Collagen Induction for a Plumper, Youthful Look 
Controlled micro-stimulation activates the skinâ€™s natural renewal response, supporting firmer, plumper-looking skin and improved texture over time. 
2. 30x Enhanced Permeation of Exosomes and Peptides 
Micro-channels created during stamping allow bioactives to move far beyond surface application, enabling significantly enhanced delivery compared with topical skincare. 
3. Advanced Regenerating Bioactives, Precisely Delivered 
A concentrated blend of exosomes, peptides, PDRN, and oligo-HA works synergistically to support the appearance of fine lines, uneven tone, enlarged pores, and post-blemish texture. 
4. Clinic-Inspired Results at a Fraction of the Cost 
Built on the same biological principles as clinical microneedlingâ€”without appointments, downtime, or high per-session feesâ€”making it a practical, repeatable at-home alternative.

Concerns: Fine Lines Â· Loss of Firmness Â· Acne Scars 
Derived from deep-sea salmon DNA and widely used in clinic-inspired skincare.

 â€¢ Commonly featured in routines targeting post-acne marks and uneven skin texture

Concerns: Dullness Â· Lack of Glow

data.headline: Micro Infusion System

steps.text_content: Lightly mist the skin with the hypochlorous acid (HOCL) spray to cleanse and refresh the skin surface before application
Twist open the device, fill it with serum. and close it securely.
Hold the device upside down for about 2 minutes, allowing the serum to evenly saturate the micro-needle tips.
Gently press the device onto the skin using a stamping motion. Work across the face or neck with light, even pressure.
steps.original_filename: Step 4 Sc Tap On Face V2sv2.mp4

steps.text_content: Apply any remaining serum to the face and neck
Apply the calming mask as the final step to support skin comfort

Softened appearance  of expression lines
Imaging shows a softening in the appearance of fine lines, particularly across expression-prone areas such as the forehead and eye contour, contributing to a smoother-looking skin surface.

More even-looking complexion
Skin analysis images show reduced contrast in the appearance of freckles and uneven pigmentation, supporting a more uniform-looking skintone.

Observed improvement in visible pore definition 
Skin analysis images show a reduction in the appearance of enlarged pores, with skin texture appearing smoother and more refined across treated areas.

items.title: How does Micro-Infusion work?
items.content: Micro-Infusion uses ultra-fine 0.5 mm titanium microneedles to create microscopic channels in the skin. This allows the serum to be delivered more effectively than topical application, helping skin absorb active ingredients where they can work best.

items.title: When will I see the results?
items.content:
Skincare results vary by individual. Most users notice an immediate boost in radiance and hydration, with skin looking fresher and more refined within 1â€“2 days after treatment. With regular use, results build progressively â€” including smoother texture, softer fine lines, and improved overall skin quality.

This makes Micro-Infusion an ideal pre-event treatment, especially when performed one or two days before important occasions.

items.title: Is there any downtime?
items.content: There is little to no downtime for most users. Skin may appear slightly flushed immediately after use, which typically subsides within a short period.

items.title: How often should I use the micro-infusion system?
items.content:
The system is designed for periodic use, not daily skincare.
Most routines incorporate it once every 1-2 weeks, depending on skin condition and comfort.

items.title: Is the treatment painful?
items.content: The sensation is minimal and generally described as a light pinprick or tingling feeling. The ultra-fine 0.5 mm titanium microneedles and controlled stamping design are intended to keep the experience gentle when used as directed. Most users find the sensation easy to tolerate and quickly adjust once the treatment begins.

items.title: Can i use it with my existing skincare products?
items.content: Yes, The system is designed to complement your current routine, not replace it. You can continue using your regular cleanser, moisturizer, and sunscreen as usual.

items.title: Are the micro-needles head reusable?
items.content:
No, each needle cartridge is designed for single-use only.
After each session, it is strongly advised to dispose of the used needle head properly to maintain optimal hygiene and effective treatment results.

items.title: When is the best time to do micro-infusion?
items.content:
We recommend performing the treatment in the evening, before bedtime.
After treatment, avoid sun exposure and makeup for 24 hours, allowing your skin to fully absorb the serum and recover optimally.

items.title: What are the serum ingredients?
items.content: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Copper Tripeptide-1, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sclerotium Gum, Sodium DNA(PDRN), Tranexamic Acid, Saccharide Isomerate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Lycium Barbarum Callus (Goji Exosome) Culture Extract, Isomalt, Lecithin, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid

items.title: Can you use it around the eyes, lips and on the neck?
items.content: Yes. The Micro-Infusion System is safe to use on delicate areas, including the under-eye area, lips, and neck. Itâ€™s an effective way to address concerns such as fine lines, eye bags, loss of firmness, and sagging skin in areas that need extra care.

items.title: Is it safe for sensitive or allergy-prone skin?
items.content:
The formula is designed to be gentle and skin-compatible. However, if you have highly sensitive skin or known allergies, we recommend performing a patch test before use or consulting a healthcare professional. 
Avoid use on irritated, broken, or compromised skin.

items.title: Why should not use this system?
items.content:
Avoid use if you:
  â€¢ Have active skin infections or open wounds
  â€¢ Are experiencing severe skin irritation
  â€¢ Have been advised against microneedling-type treatments by a professional.
When in doubt, consult a skincare professional before use.

data.content: Plumper-looking skin Â· enhanced bioactive delivery Â· clinic-inspired design
data.subheadline: Upgrade Your Routine with Precision Micro-Infusion

blocks.name: Upgrade Your Routine with Precision Micro-Infusion

policy_content.about-us:
We develop clinic-inspired skincare systems designed for controlled, cosmetic use at home, with a focus on safety, precision, and repeatability. 
Our work is guided by established dermatologic principles and a commitment to responsible product design. 

Purpose & Rationale 
Conventional topical skincare primarily acts on the skin surface, while professional procedures such as microneedling are performed in clinical settings under controlled conditions. 
Our objective was to bridge this gap by designing a system that applies the same biological mechanisms used in clinical microneedlingâ€”micro-stimulation and enhanced deliveryâ€”in a gentler, consumer-appropriate format. 
The result is a structured at-home routine that emphasizes control, consistency, and user understanding, rather than intensity. 

Design & Safety Principles 
  • Every component of our system is developed according to the following principles: Controlled micro-stimulation using ultra-fine, short-length needles intended for cosmetic use 
  • Single-use, sterile components to reduce cross-contamination and variability
  • Vertical stamping mechanics designed to minimize skin dragging or tearing Measured delivery of bioactive formulations, released only during use 
 
The system is designed to be repeatable, predictable, and non-aggressive when used according to instructions.
policy_content.refund-policy:
Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}

At {{BRAND_NAME}}, we want you to feel confident about your purchase. If you change your mind, you may return the product unused and in its original, unopened condition within {{REFUND_DAYS}} days of delivery for a refund.

---

1. Return Eligibility

1.1 Eligible Returns

To be eligible for a return, your item must be:

  • Within {{REFUND_DAYS}} days of delivery
  • In its original, unopened condition
  • In original packaging with all accessories, manuals, and inserts
  • Not damaged by external factors (misuse, accidents, improper handling)

1.2 Promotional and Bundle Purchases

If you purchased items as part of a promotion, bundle, or set, all items in the bundle must be returned together to qualify for a refund.

---

2. Non-Refundable Items

The following items are not eligible for refund:

  • Opened or used products
  • Products without original packaging
  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable products or digital content
  • Items marked as "Final Sale" or "Non-Returnable"
  • Personalized or customized items
  • Free promotional items (must be returned with the qualifying purchase)
---

3. Fees

3.1 Original Shipping Fees

Original shipping, taxes, and handling fees are non-refundable.

3.2 Return Shipping

Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item is defective or we made an error.

3.3 Restocking Fee

A restocking fee of {{RESTOCKING_FEE}} may apply for returns that are not in original condition or are missing original packaging.

---

4. How to Request a Return

Step 1: Contact Us

Email us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} with:

  • Your order number
  • Reason for return
  • Photos of the product (if applicable)

Step 2: Receive Return Authorization

We will review your request and provide a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number within 2-3 business days.

Important: Do not return items without an RMA number. Unauthorized returns may be refused or delayed.

Step 3: Ship Your Return

Pack the item securely in its original packaging and ship to:

{{RETURN_ADDRESS}}

Include your RMA number on the outside of the package.

Step 4: Refund Processing

Once we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund within {{REFUND_PROCESSING_DAYS}} business days. Refunds will be issued to your original payment method.

Note: It may take an additional 5-10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement, depending on your financial institution.

---

5. Refund Methods

5.1 Original Payment Method

Refunds are typically issued to your original payment method:

  • Credit/Debit Card: Refund to the card used
  • PayPal: Refund to PayPal account
  • Bank Transfer: Refund to original bank account

5.2 Buy Now Pay Later (Klarna, Afterpay, etc.)

Orders placed using Buy Now Pay Later services may receive store credit only instead of a refund to the payment service.

5.3 Store Credit

In some cases, you may choose to receive store credit instead of a refund. Store credit does not expire and can be used on future purchases.

---

6. Exchanges

We currently do not offer direct exchanges. To exchange an item:

  • Return the original item for a refund

  • Place a new order for the desired item

    • This ensures faster processing and guarantees availability of your desired product.

    ---

    7. Damaged or Defective Items

    7.1 Reporting Damage

    If you receive a damaged or defective product, please contact us within 7 days of delivery at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} with:

    • Your order number
    • Photos of the damage
    • Description of the issue

    7.2 Resolution

    For damaged or defective items, we will:

    • Send a free replacement, OR
    • Issue a full refund including shipping costs

    You will not be charged for return shipping on defective items.

    7.3 Warranty

    Our products are covered by a {{WARRANTY_MONTHS}}-month warranty against manufacturing defects. This warranty does not cover:

    • Normal wear and tear
    • Damage from misuse or accidents
    • Unauthorized modifications

    ---

    8. Order Cancellation

    8.1 Before Shipment

    You may cancel your order before it ships by contacting us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}. If we can cancel before dispatch, you will receive a full refund.

    8.2 After Shipment

    Once an order has been dispatched, it cannot be canceled. You will need to wait for delivery and then follow the return process.

    ---

    9. Late or Missing Refunds

    If you haven't received your refund after the expected time:

  • Check your bank account or credit card statement again
  • Contact your credit card company or bank (processing times vary)
  • If you've done all of this and still have not received your refund, contact us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}

    • ---

    10. International Returns

    10.1 Return Shipping

    International customers are responsible for return shipping costs and any customs fees.

    10.2 Customs Duties

    If customs duties were charged on your original order and the package is returned, those fees are non-refundable as they are collected by customs authorities.

    10.3 Refused Packages

    If you refuse delivery of a package or fail to pay customs duties, any fees incurred will be deducted from your refund.

    ---

    11. Sale Items

    Items purchased on sale or with discount codes are eligible for return under the same terms as regular-priced items, unless marked as "Final Sale."

    ---

    12. Contact Us

    Questions about returns or refunds? Contact us:

    {{COMPANY_NAME}}
    Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
    Website: {{WEBSITE_URL}}

    ---

    We appreciate your business and are committed to your satisfaction. If you have any concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.
policy_content.privacy-policy:
Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}

{{BRAND_NAME}} ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, store, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website(s), products, devices, subscriptions, applications, and related services (collectively, the "Services").

By accessing or using our Services, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

---

1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

1.1 Information You Voluntarily Provide

We may collect personal information you provide directly, including:

  • Name
  • Email address
  • Phone number
  • Shipping and billing address
  • Payment information (processed securely by third-party payment processors; we do not store full payment card details)
  • Account login credentials
  • Subscription preferences
  • Communications with customer support
  • Reviews, testimonials, images, videos, or other user-generated content

1.2 Automatically Collected Information

When you use the Services, we may automatically collect:

  • IP address
  • Device type, operating system, browser type
  • Pages visited, time spent, interaction behavior
  • Referring URLs
  • Cookies, pixels, and similar tracking technologies

1.3 Skin, Beauty & Preference Information (Non-Medical)

You may voluntarily provide information related to:

  • Skin type, skin concerns, or cosmetic preferences
  • Product usage feedback
  • Self-reported lifestyle or routine preferences

Important clarification:

  • This information is not medical data
  • We do not collect or store protected health information (PHI)
  • Such data is used solely for cosmetic personalization and experience enhancement
---

2. AI-DRIVEN PERSONALIZATION & SKIN PROFILING

If our Services include AI-powered features (e.g., quizzes, recommendations, routines, progress tracking):

  • AI outputs are cosmetic and informational only
  • AI suggestions are not medical advice
  • AI systems operate on user-provided inputs and usage data
  • Outputs are probabilistic and not guaranteed

We may use anonymized or aggregated data to:

  • Improve algorithms
  • Enhance product recommendations
  • Optimize customer experience

You may opt out of certain personalization features at any time.

---

3. MICRO-INFUSION DEVICE & PRODUCT DATA DISCLAIMER

Our at-home skincare devices (including micro-infusion tools):

  • Do not transmit biometric or physiological data
  • Do not collect diagnostic or health signals
  • Do not monitor medical conditions

Any usage data collected (if applicable) relates only to:

  • Product engagement
  • Usage frequency
  • Customer experience improvement
---

4. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

We use your information to:

  • Process and fulfill orders
  • Manage subscriptions and accounts
  • Provide customer support
  • Deliver personalized cosmetic experiences
  • Send transactional and promotional communications
  • Improve products, Services, and marketing performance
  • Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
  • Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
---

5. COOKIES, ANALYTICS & ADVERTISING

We use cookies, pixels, and similar technologies to:

  • Enable essential site functions
  • Remember user preferences
  • Analyze traffic and performance
  • Deliver relevant advertising

Third-party partners (e.g., analytics and advertising platforms) may collect information according to their own privacy policies.

You may control cookies through browser settings; disabling cookies may affect functionality.

---

6. SMS, WHATSAPP & INSTANT MESSAGING COMMUNICATIONS

If you opt in to SMS, WhatsApp, or other messaging services:

  • You consent to receive transactional and promotional messages
  • Message frequency may vary
  • Message and data rates may apply
  • You may opt out at any time by following unsubscribe instructions (e.g., replying "STOP")
We do not share phone numbers with third parties for their own marketing purposes.

---

7. SHARING OF INFORMATION

We do not sell your personal information.

We may share data with:

  • Payment processors
  • Shipping and logistics partners
  • Email, SMS, and messaging service providers
  • Analytics and advertising partners
  • Customer support platforms
  • Legal or regulatory authorities when required
All third parties are contractually required to protect your data and use it only for authorized purposes.

---

8. USER-GENERATED CONTENT & TESTIMONIALS

If you submit reviews, testimonials, images, or videos:

  • You grant us a royalty-free, worldwide, perpetual license to use this content for marketing and promotional purposes
  • Any personal information included may be publicly visible
  • Testimonials reflect individual cosmetic experiences, not typical or guaranteed results
---

9. DATA RETENTION

We retain personal data only as long as necessary to:

  • Provide the Services
  • Meet legal, accounting, or compliance requirements
  • Resolve disputes and enforce agreement

Data may be anonymized or aggregated for long-term analytical use.

---

10. DATA SECURITY

We implement reasonable technical, administrative, and organizational safeguards to protect your information.

However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

---

11. CROSS-BORDER DATA TRANSFERS

Your information may be processed or stored outside your country of residence, including in the United States or other jurisdictions with different data protection laws.

We implement appropriate safeguards to ensure lawful international data transfers where required.

---

12. YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS

Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate information
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Object to or restrict processing
  • Withdraw consent for marketing
Requests can be submitted via the contact details below.

---

13. CALIFORNIA PRIVACY RIGHTS (CPRA)

California residents have the right to:

  • Know what personal data is collected
  • Request deletion of personal data
  • Opt out of certain data sharing
We do not sell personal information as defined by California law.

---

14. EU / UK (GDPR)

For users in the EU or UK:

  • Lawful bases include consent, contract necessity, and legitimate interests
  • You may lodge complaints with your local data protection authority
---

15. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY

Our Services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age.
We do not knowingly collect data from children.

---

16. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
Changes will be posted with a revised "Last Updated" date.

---

17. CONTACT US

For privacy-related inquiries:

{{BRAND_NAME}}
Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}


Address: {{CONTACT_ADDRESS}}

Thank you for shopping at {{BRAND_NAME}}! We are committed to delivering your order in a timely and secure manner. Please review our shipping policy below.

1. Processing Time

1.1 Order Processing

Orders are processed within {{PROCESSING_DAYS}} business days after payment confirmation.

  • Orders placed before {{CUTOFF_TIME}} are typically processed the same business day
  • Orders placed after {{CUTOFF_TIME}} will be processed the next business day
  • Business days are Monday through Friday, excluding public holidays

1.2 Order Confirmation

You will receive an email confirmation once your order is placed, and another email with tracking information once your order ships.

2. Shipping Methods and Timeframes

2.1 Domestic Shipping ({{WAREHOUSE_LOCATION}})

| Shipping Method | Estimated Delivery | Cost |
| Standard Shipping | {{DOMESTIC_SHIPPING_DAYS}} | Calculated at checkout |
| Express Shipping | 1-2 business days | Calculated at checkout |
| Free Shipping | {{DOMESTIC_SHIPPING_DAYS}} | Orders over {{FREE_SHIPPING_THRESHOLD}} |

2.2 International Shipping

| Region | Estimated Delivery |
| Canada | 5-10 business days |
| Europe (UK, EU) | 7-14 business days |
| Australia/New Zealand | 10-14 business days |
| Asia | 7-14 business days |
| Rest of World | {{INTERNATIONAL_SHIPPING_DAYS}} |

Note: International delivery times are estimates and may vary due to customs processing.

2.3 Peak Season Delays

During peak seasons (holidays, sales events), processing and delivery times may be extended. We recommend ordering early to ensure timely delivery.

3. Shipping Carriers

We partner with trusted carriers to deliver your orders:

{{SHIPPING_CARRIERS}}

The carrier used depends on your location and selected shipping method. You will receive tracking information via email once your order ships.

4. Shipping Costs

4.1 Domestic Shipping

Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on:

  • Order weight and dimensions
  • Delivery address
  • Selected shipping method
Free Shipping: We offer free standard shipping on orders over {{FREE_SHIPPING_THRESHOLD}} within {{WAREHOUSE_LOCATION}}.

4.2 International Shipping

International shipping rates vary by destination and are calculated at checkout.

5. Order Tracking

5.1 Tracking Information

Once your order ships, you will receive an email with:

  • Tracking number
  • Link to track your package
  • Estimated delivery date

5.2 Tracking Updates

Tracking information may take 24-48 hours to update after shipment. If tracking hasn't updated after 48 hours, please contact us.

6. Delivery Information

6.1 Delivery Address

  • We deliver to physical addresses only
  • PO Boxes may not be accepted for some shipping methods
  • Please ensure your address is complete and accurate
  • We are not responsible for packages delivered to incorrect addresses provided by the customer

6.2 Signature Requirement

Some orders may require a signature upon delivery for security purposes. If no one is available, the carrier will leave instructions for redelivery or pickup.

6.3 Delivery Confirmation

Delivery confirmation from the carrier constitutes proof of delivery. Risk of loss transfers to you upon delivery to the carrier.

7. International Orders

7.1 Customs, Duties, and Taxes

International orders may be subject to:

  • Import duties
  • Customs fees
  • Local taxes (VAT, GST)
These charges are the responsibility of the recipient and are not included in our product prices or shipping fees.

7.2 Customs Delays

International packages may be held by customs for inspection. We are not responsible for delays due to customs processing.

7.3 Refused Packages

If you refuse delivery or fail to pay customs duties:

  • The package will be returned to us
  • Return shipping costs will be deducted from any refund
  • Original shipping fees are non-refundable

8. Address Changes

8.1 Before Shipment

If you need to change your shipping address, contact us immediately at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}. We will do our best to update your order if it hasn't shipped yet.

8.2 After Shipment

Once an order has shipped, address changes cannot be guaranteed. You may need to contact the carrier directly or wait for the package and arrange a return.

9. Shipping Issues

9.1 Lost Packages

If your tracking shows delivered but you haven't received your package:

  • Check with neighbors or household members
  • Look for a delivery notice
  • Contact your local carrier
  • Contact us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} if the issue persists
  • We will work with the carrier to locate your package or provide a resolution.

9.2 Damaged Packages

If your package arrives damaged:

  • Take photos of the damage (box and contents)
  • Contact us within 7 days at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
  • We will arrange for a replacement or refund

9.3 Incorrect Items

If you receive incorrect items, please contact us immediately at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} with your order number and photos. We will ship the correct items at no additional cost.

10. Shipping Restrictions

10.1 Restricted Locations

We may be unable to ship to certain locations due to:

  • Carrier restrictions
  • Government regulations
  • Regional circumstances
If we cannot ship to your location, we will notify you and cancel your order with a full refund.

10.2 Product Restrictions

Some products may have shipping restrictions to certain countries due to local regulations. Restricted items will be noted on the product page.

11. Eco-Friendly Packaging

We are committed to sustainability. Our packaging is:

  • Recyclable and/or biodegradable where possible
  • Right-sized to minimize waste
  • Free of excess plastic when possible

12. Contact Us

Questions about shipping? Contact us:

{{COMPANY_NAME}}
Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
Website: {{WEBSITE_URL}}

Thank you for choosing {{BRAND_NAME}}. We appreciate your business!

Gently press the device onto the skin using a stamping motion. Work across the face or neck with light, even pressure.

items.title: How does Micro-Infusion work?
items.content: Micro-Infusion uses ultra-fine 0.5 mm titanium microneedles to create microscopic channels in the skin. This allows the serum to be delivered more effectively than topical application, helping skin absorb active ingredients where they can work best.

items.title: When will I see the results?
items.content:
Skincare results vary by individual. Most users notice an immediate boost in radiance and hydration, with skin looking fresher and more refined within 1â€“2 days after treatment. With regular use, results build progressively â€” including smoother texture, softer fine lines, and improved overall skin quality.

This makes Micro-Infusion an ideal pre-event treatment, especially when performed one or two days before important occasions.

items.title: Is there any downtime?
items.content: There is little to no downtime for most users. Skin may appear slightly flushed immediately after use, which typically subsides within a short period.

items.title: How often should I use the micro-infusion system?
items.content:
The system is designed for periodic use, not daily skincare.
Most routines incorporate it once every 1-2 weeks, depending on skin condition and comfort.

items.title: Is the treatment painful?
items.content: The sensation is minimal and generally described as a light pinprick or tingling feeling. The ultra-fine 0.5 mm titanium microneedles and controlled stamping design are intended to keep the experience gentle when used as directed. Most users find the sensation easy to tolerate and quickly adjust once the treatment begins.

items.title: Can i use it with my existing skincare products?
items.content: Yes, The system is designed to complement your current routine, not replace it. You can continue using your regular cleanser, moisturizer, and sunscreen as usual.

items.title: Are the micro-needles head reusable?
items.content:
No, each needle cartridge is designed for single-use only.
After each session, it is strongly advised to dispose of the used needle head properly to maintain optimal hygiene and effective treatment results.

items.title: When is the best time to do micro-infusion?
items.content:
We recommend performing the treatment in the evening, before bedtime.
After treatment, avoid sun exposure and makeup for 24 hours, allowing your skin to fully absorb the serum and recover optimally.

items.title: What are the serum ingredients?
items.content: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Copper Tripeptide-1, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sclerotium Gum, Sodium DNA(PDRN), Tranexamic Acid, Saccharide Isomerate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Lycium Barbarum Callus (Goji Exosome) Culture Extract, Isomalt, Lecithin, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid

items.title: Can you use it around the eyes, lips and on the neck?
items.content: Yes. The Micro-Infusion System is safe to use on delicate areas, including the under-eye area, lips, and neck. Itâ€™s an effective way to address concerns such as fine lines, eye bags, loss of firmness, and sagging skin in areas that need extra care.

items.title: Is it safe for sensitive or allergy-prone skin?
items.content:
The formula is designed to be gentle and skin-compatible. However, if you have highly sensitive skin or known allergies, we recommend performing a patch test before use or consulting a healthcare professional. 
Avoid use on irritated, broken, or compromised skin.

items.title: Why should not use this system?
items.content:
Avoid use if you:
  â€¢ Have active skin infections or open wounds
  â€¢ Are experiencing severe skin irritation
  â€¢ Have been advised against microneedling-type treatments by a professional.
When in doubt, consult a skincare professional before use.

policy_content.about-us:
We develop clinic-inspired skincare systems designed for controlled, cosmetic use at home, with a focus on safety, precision, and repeatability. 
Our work is guided by established dermatologic principles and a commitment to responsible product design. 

Purpose & Rationale 
Conventional topical skincare primarily acts on the skin surface, while professional procedures such as microneedling are performed in clinical settings under controlled conditions. 
Our objective was to bridge this gap by designing a system that applies the same biological mechanisms used in clinical microneedlingâ€”micro-stimulation and enhanced deliveryâ€”in a gentler, consumer-appropriate format. 
The result is a structured at-home routine that emphasizes control, consistency, and user understanding, rather than intensity. 

Design & Safety Principles 
  • Every component of our system is developed according to the following principles: Controlled micro-stimulation using ultra-fine, short-length needles intended for cosmetic use 
  • Single-use, sterile components to reduce cross-contamination and variability
  • Vertical stamping mechanics designed to minimize skin dragging or tearing Measured delivery of bioactive formulations, released only during use 
 
The system is designed to be repeatable, predictable, and non-aggressive when used according to instructions.
policy_content.refund-policy:
Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}

At {{BRAND_NAME}}, we want you to feel confident about your purchase. If you change your mind, you may return the product unused and in its original, unopened condition within {{REFUND_DAYS}} days of delivery for a refund.

---

1. Return Eligibility

1.1 Eligible Returns

To be eligible for a return, your item must be:

  • Within {{REFUND_DAYS}} days of delivery
  • In its original, unopened condition
  • In original packaging with all accessories, manuals, and inserts
  • Not damaged by external factors (misuse, accidents, improper handling)

1.2 Promotional and Bundle Purchases

If you purchased items as part of a promotion, bundle, or set, all items in the bundle must be returned together to qualify for a refund.

---

2. Non-Refundable Items

The following items are not eligible for refund:

  • Opened or used products
  • Products without original packaging
  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable products or digital content
  • Items marked as "Final Sale" or "Non-Returnable"
  • Personalized or customized items
  • Free promotional items (must be returned with the qualifying purchase)
---

3. Fees

3.1 Original Shipping Fees

Original shipping, taxes, and handling fees are non-refundable.

3.2 Return Shipping

Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item is defective or we made an error.

3.3 Restocking Fee

A restocking fee of {{RESTOCKING_FEE}} may apply for returns that are not in original condition or are missing original packaging.

---

4. How to Request a Return

Step 1: Contact Us

Email us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} with:

  • Your order number
  • Reason for return
  • Photos of the product (if applicable)

Step 2: Receive Return Authorization

We will review your request and provide a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number within 2-3 business days.

Important: Do not return items without an RMA number. Unauthorized returns may be refused or delayed.

Step 3: Ship Your Return

Pack the item securely in its original packaging and ship to:

{{RETURN_ADDRESS}}

Include your RMA number on the outside of the package.

Step 4: Refund Processing

Once we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund within {{REFUND_PROCESSING_DAYS}} business days. Refunds will be issued to your original payment method.

Note: It may take an additional 5-10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement, depending on your financial institution.

---

5. Refund Methods

5.1 Original Payment Method

Refunds are typically issued to your original payment method:

  • Credit/Debit Card: Refund to the card used
  • PayPal: Refund to PayPal account
  • Bank Transfer: Refund to original bank account

5.2 Buy Now Pay Later (Klarna, Afterpay, etc.)

Orders placed using Buy Now Pay Later services may receive store credit only instead of a refund to the payment service.

5.3 Store Credit

In some cases, you may choose to receive store credit instead of a refund. Store credit does not expire and can be used on future purchases.

---

6. Exchanges

We currently do not offer direct exchanges. To exchange an item:

  • Return the original item for a refund

  • Place a new order for the desired item

    • This ensures faster processing and guarantees availability of your desired product.

    ---

    7. Damaged or Defective Items

    7.1 Reporting Damage

    If you receive a damaged or defective product, please contact us within 7 days of delivery at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} with:

    • Your order number
    • Photos of the damage
    • Description of the issue

    7.2 Resolution

    For damaged or defective items, we will:

    • Send a free replacement, OR
    • Issue a full refund including shipping costs

    You will not be charged for return shipping on defective items.

    7.3 Warranty

    Our products are covered by a {{WARRANTY_MONTHS}}-month warranty against manufacturing defects. This warranty does not cover:

    • Normal wear and tear
    • Damage from misuse or accidents
    • Unauthorized modifications

    ---

    8. Order Cancellation

    8.1 Before Shipment

    You may cancel your order before it ships by contacting us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}. If we can cancel before dispatch, you will receive a full refund.

    8.2 After Shipment

    Once an order has been dispatched, it cannot be canceled. You will need to wait for delivery and then follow the return process.

    ---

    9. Late or Missing Refunds

    If you haven't received your refund after the expected time:

  • Check your bank account or credit card statement again
  • Contact your credit card company or bank (processing times vary)
  • If you've done all of this and still have not received your refund, contact us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}

    • ---

    10. International Returns

    10.1 Return Shipping

    International customers are responsible for return shipping costs and any customs fees.

    10.2 Customs Duties

    If customs duties were charged on your original order and the package is returned, those fees are non-refundable as they are collected by customs authorities.

    10.3 Refused Packages

    If you refuse delivery of a package or fail to pay customs duties, any fees incurred will be deducted from your refund.

    ---

    11. Sale Items

    Items purchased on sale or with discount codes are eligible for return under the same terms as regular-priced items, unless marked as "Final Sale."

    ---

    12. Contact Us

    Questions about returns or refunds? Contact us:

    {{COMPANY_NAME}}
    Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
    Website: {{WEBSITE_URL}}

    ---

    We appreciate your business and are committed to your satisfaction. If you have any concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.
policy_content.privacy-policy:
Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}

{{BRAND_NAME}} ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, store, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website(s), products, devices, subscriptions, applications, and related services (collectively, the "Services").

By accessing or using our Services, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

---

1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

1.1 Information You Voluntarily Provide

We may collect personal information you provide directly, including:

  • Name
  • Email address
  • Phone number
  • Shipping and billing address
  • Payment information (processed securely by third-party payment processors; we do not store full payment card details)
  • Account login credentials
  • Subscription preferences
  • Communications with customer support
  • Reviews, testimonials, images, videos, or other user-generated content

1.2 Automatically Collected Information

When you use the Services, we may automatically collect:

  • IP address
  • Device type, operating system, browser type
  • Pages visited, time spent, interaction behavior
  • Referring URLs
  • Cookies, pixels, and similar tracking technologies

1.3 Skin, Beauty & Preference Information (Non-Medical)

You may voluntarily provide information related to:

  • Skin type, skin concerns, or cosmetic preferences
  • Product usage feedback
  • Self-reported lifestyle or routine preferences

Important clarification:

  • This information is not medical data
  • We do not collect or store protected health information (PHI)
  • Such data is used solely for cosmetic personalization and experience enhancement
---

2. AI-DRIVEN PERSONALIZATION & SKIN PROFILING

If our Services include AI-powered features (e.g., quizzes, recommendations, routines, progress tracking):

  • AI outputs are cosmetic and informational only
  • AI suggestions are not medical advice
  • AI systems operate on user-provided inputs and usage data
  • Outputs are probabilistic and not guaranteed

We may use anonymized or aggregated data to:

  • Improve algorithms
  • Enhance product recommendations
  • Optimize customer experience

You may opt out of certain personalization features at any time.

---

3. MICRO-INFUSION DEVICE & PRODUCT DATA DISCLAIMER

Our at-home skincare devices (including micro-infusion tools):

  • Do not transmit biometric or physiological data
  • Do not collect diagnostic or health signals
  • Do not monitor medical conditions

Any usage data collected (if applicable) relates only to:

  • Product engagement
  • Usage frequency
  • Customer experience improvement
---

4. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

We use your information to:

  • Process and fulfill orders
  • Manage subscriptions and accounts
  • Provide customer support
  • Deliver personalized cosmetic experiences
  • Send transactional and promotional communications
  • Improve products, Services, and marketing performance
  • Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
  • Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
---

5. COOKIES, ANALYTICS & ADVERTISING

We use cookies, pixels, and similar technologies to:

  • Enable essential site functions
  • Remember user preferences
  • Analyze traffic and performance
  • Deliver relevant advertising

Third-party partners (e.g., analytics and advertising platforms) may collect information according to their own privacy policies.

You may control cookies through browser settings; disabling cookies may affect functionality.

---

6. SMS, WHATSAPP & INSTANT MESSAGING COMMUNICATIONS

If you opt in to SMS, WhatsApp, or other messaging services:

  • You consent to receive transactional and promotional messages
  • Message frequency may vary
  • Message and data rates may apply
  • You may opt out at any time by following unsubscribe instructions (e.g., replying "STOP")
We do not share phone numbers with third parties for their own marketing purposes.

---

7. SHARING OF INFORMATION

We do not sell your personal information.

We may share data with:

  • Payment processors
  • Shipping and logistics partners
  • Email, SMS, and messaging service providers
  • Analytics and advertising partners
  • Customer support platforms
  • Legal or regulatory authorities when required
All third parties are contractually required to protect your data and use it only for authorized purposes.

---

8. USER-GENERATED CONTENT & TESTIMONIALS

If you submit reviews, testimonials, images, or videos:

  • You grant us a royalty-free, worldwide, perpetual license to use this content for marketing and promotional purposes
  • Any personal information included may be publicly visible
  • Testimonials reflect individual cosmetic experiences, not typical or guaranteed results
---

9. DATA RETENTION

We retain personal data only as long as necessary to:

  • Provide the Services
  • Meet legal, accounting, or compliance requirements
  • Resolve disputes and enforce agreement

Data may be anonymized or aggregated for long-term analytical use.

---

10. DATA SECURITY

We implement reasonable technical, administrative, and organizational safeguards to protect your information.

However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

---

11. CROSS-BORDER DATA TRANSFERS

Your information may be processed or stored outside your country of residence, including in the United States or other jurisdictions with different data protection laws.

We implement appropriate safeguards to ensure lawful international data transfers where required.

---

12. YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS

Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate information
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Object to or restrict processing
  • Withdraw consent for marketing
Requests can be submitted via the contact details below.

---

13. CALIFORNIA PRIVACY RIGHTS (CPRA)

California residents have the right to:

  • Know what personal data is collected
  • Request deletion of personal data
  • Opt out of certain data sharing
We do not sell personal information as defined by California law.

---

14. EU / UK (GDPR)

For users in the EU or UK:

  • Lawful bases include consent, contract necessity, and legitimate interests
  • You may lodge complaints with your local data protection authority
---

15. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY

Our Services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age.
We do not knowingly collect data from children.

---

16. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
Changes will be posted with a revised "Last Updated" date.

---

17. CONTACT US

For privacy-related inquiries:

{{BRAND_NAME}}
Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}


Address: {{CONTACT_ADDRESS}}
policy_content.shipping-policy:
Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}

Thank you for shopping at {{BRAND_NAME}}! We are committed to delivering your order in a timely and secure manner. Please review our shipping policy below.

1. Processing Time

1.1 Order Processing

Orders are processed within {{PROCESSING_DAYS}} business days after payment confirmation.

  • Orders placed before {{CUTOFF_TIME}} are typically processed the same business day
  • Orders placed after {{CUTOFF_TIME}} will be processed the next business day
  • Business days are Monday through Friday, excluding public holidays

1.2 Order Confirmation

You will receive an email confirmation once your order is placed, and another email with tracking information once your order ships.

2. Shipping Methods and Timeframes

2.1 Domestic Shipping ({{WAREHOUSE_LOCATION}})

| Shipping Method | Estimated Delivery | Cost |
| Standard Shipping | {{DOMESTIC_SHIPPING_DAYS}} | Calculated at checkout |
| Express Shipping | 1-2 business days | Calculated at checkout |
| Free Shipping | {{DOMESTIC_SHIPPING_DAYS}} | Orders over {{FREE_SHIPPING_THRESHOLD}} |

2.2 International Shipping

| Region | Estimated Delivery |
| Canada | 5-10 business days |
| Europe (UK, EU) | 7-14 business days |
| Australia/New Zealand | 10-14 business days |
| Asia | 7-14 business days |
| Rest of World | {{INTERNATIONAL_SHIPPING_DAYS}} |

Note: International delivery times are estimates and may vary due to customs processing.

2.3 Peak Season Delays

During peak seasons (holidays, sales events), processing and delivery times may be extended. We recommend ordering early to ensure timely delivery.

3. Shipping Carriers

We partner with trusted carriers to deliver your orders:

{{SHIPPING_CARRIERS}}

The carrier used depends on your location and selected shipping method. You will receive tracking information via email once your order ships.

4. Shipping Costs

4.1 Domestic Shipping

Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on:

  • Order weight and dimensions
  • Delivery address
  • Selected shipping method
Free Shipping: We offer free standard shipping on orders over {{FREE_SHIPPING_THRESHOLD}} within {{WAREHOUSE_LOCATION}}.

4.2 International Shipping

International shipping rates vary by destination and are calculated at checkout.

5. Order Tracking

5.1 Tracking Information

Once your order ships, you will receive an email with:

  • Tracking number
  • Link to track your package
  • Estimated delivery date

5.2 Tracking Updates

Tracking information may take 24-48 hours to update after shipment. If tracking hasn't updated after 48 hours, please contact us.

6. Delivery Information

6.1 Delivery Address

  • We deliver to physical addresses only
  • PO Boxes may not be accepted for some shipping methods
  • Please ensure your address is complete and accurate
  • We are not responsible for packages delivered to incorrect addresses provided by the customer

6.2 Signature Requirement

Some orders may require a signature upon delivery for security purposes. If no one is available, the carrier will leave instructions for redelivery or pickup.

6.3 Delivery Confirmation

Delivery confirmation from the carrier constitutes proof of delivery. Risk of loss transfers to you upon delivery to the carrier.

7. International Orders

7.1 Customs, Duties, and Taxes

International orders may be subject to:

  • Import duties
  • Customs fees
  • Local taxes (VAT, GST)
These charges are the responsibility of the recipient and are not included in our product prices or shipping fees.

7.2 Customs Delays

International packages may be held by customs for inspection. We are not responsible for delays due to customs processing.

7.3 Refused Packages

If you refuse delivery or fail to pay customs duties:

  • The package will be returned to us
  • Return shipping costs will be deducted from any refund
  • Original shipping fees are non-refundable

8. Address Changes

8.1 Before Shipment

If you need to change your shipping address, contact us immediately at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}. We will do our best to update your order if it hasn't shipped yet.

8.2 After Shipment

Once an order has shipped, address changes cannot be guaranteed. You may need to contact the carrier directly or wait for the package and arrange a return.

9. Shipping Issues

9.1 Lost Packages

If your tracking shows delivered but you haven't received your package:

  • Check with neighbors or household members
  • Look for a delivery notice
  • Contact your local carrier
  • Contact us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} if the issue persists
  • We will work with the carrier to locate your package or provide a resolution.

9.2 Damaged Packages

If your package arrives damaged:

  • Take photos of the damage (box and contents)
  • Contact us within 7 days at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
  • We will arrange for a replacement or refund

9.3 Incorrect Items

If you receive incorrect items, please contact us immediately at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} with your order number and photos. We will ship the correct items at no additional cost.

10. Shipping Restrictions

10.1 Restricted Locations

We may be unable to ship to certain locations due to:

  • Carrier restrictions
  • Government regulations
  • Regional circumstances
If we cannot ship to your location, we will notify you and cancel your order with a full refund.

10.2 Product Restrictions

Some products may have shipping restrictions to certain countries due to local regulations. Restricted items will be noted on the product page.

11. Eco-Friendly Packaging

We are committed to sustainability. Our packaging is:

  • Recyclable and/or biodegradable where possible
  • Right-sized to minimize waste
  • Free of excess plastic when possible

12. Contact Us

Questions about shipping? Contact us:

{{COMPANY_NAME}}
Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
Website: {{WEBSITE_URL}}

Thank you for choosing {{BRAND_NAME}}. We appreciate your business!
policy_content.terms-of-service:
Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}

Welcome to {{BRAND_NAME}} ("Company," "we," "us," or "our").
These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website(s), products, devices, subscriptions, and related services (collectively, the "Services").

By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Services.

1. Eligibility

You must be at least 18 years old (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction) to purchase or use our products. By using the Services, you represent and warrant that you meet this requirement.

2. Nature of the Products & Medical Disclaimer

Our products include at-home cosmetic skincare devices and topical formulations designed to improve the appearance of skin.

Important medical disclaimer:

  • Our products are cosmetic in nature and are not medical devices unless explicitly stated.
  • Our Services do not diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
  • Results vary by individual based on skin type, age, lifestyle, consistency of use, and other factors.
  • Any content on our website is for educational and informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
  • Always consult a licensed healthcare professional before use if you are pregnant, nursing, have a medical condition, or have concerns about your skin.

3. Proper Use & Safety

You agree to:

  • Use products only as instructed.
  • Follow all safety warnings and usage guidelines provided with the product.
  • Discontinue use immediately if irritation, adverse reaction, or discomfort occurs.
  • Not modify, misuse, or attempt to sterilize or reuse components that are labeled as single-use.
We are not responsible for harm caused by misuse, failure to follow instructions, or use in contradiction to warnings.

4. Individual Results & No Guarantees

We may reference:

  • Absorption enhancement
  • Improved appearance of skin texture, hydration, tone, or radiance
  • Comparisons to topical skincare or in-clinic treatments
However:

  • Individual results are not guaranteed.
  • Testimonials and examples reflect individual experiences and do not represent typical results.
  • Claims such as "clinic-grade," "professional-level," or "more effective than topical skincare" refer to delivery method and cosmetic performance, not medical outcomes.

5. Orders, Pricing & Payments

  • All prices are shown in {{CURRENCY}} unless stated otherwise.
  • Prices, promotions, and availability are subject to change without notice.
  • By placing an order, you authorize us (or our payment processor) to charge your payment method.
  • We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including suspected fraud or errors in pricing.

6. Subscriptions & Auto-Renewal (If Applicable)

If you purchase a subscription:

  • Your subscription will automatically renew at the selected interval unless canceled before the renewal date.
  • You authorize us to charge your payment method for each renewal.
  • You may manage or cancel your subscription through your account portal or by contacting customer support.
  • No refunds are issued for partially used subscription periods unless required by law.

7. Shipping & Returns

  • Shipping times are estimates and not guaranteed.
  • Refunds, returns, and exchanges are governed by our Return & Refund Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.
Due to hygiene and safety reasons:

  • Opened or used skincare devices may not be eligible for return unless otherwise stated.
  • Results-based dissatisfaction does not automatically qualify for a refund.

8. Intellectual Property

All content on the Servicesâ€”including text, images, videos, product designs, trademarks, logos, and softwareâ€”is owned by or licensed to {{BRAND_NAME}} and protected by intellectual property laws.

You may not copy, distribute, modify, or exploit any content without our prior written consent.

9. User Content (If Applicable)

If you submit reviews, testimonials, images, or other content:

  • You grant us a royalty-free, worldwide, perpetual license to use, display, reproduce, and market such content.
  • You confirm that you own or have rights to the content and that it does not violate any third-party rights.

10. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law:

  • We are not liable for indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages, including loss of profits or personal dissatisfaction with cosmetic results.
  • Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the product giving rise to the claim.
  • Use of our products is at your own risk.

11. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless {{BRAND_NAME}}, its officers, employees, and partners from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from:

  • Misuse of products
  • Violation of these Terms
  • Violation of applicable laws or third-party rights

12. Arbitration & Governing Law

  • Any dispute arising from these Terms or the Services shall be resolved by binding arbitration, except where prohibited by law.
  • These Terms are governed by the laws of {{GOVERNING_STATE}}, without regard to conflict-of-law principles.

13. Changes to These Terms

We may update these Terms at any time.
Continued use of the Services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

14. Contact Information

For questions or concerns, contact:

{{BRAND_NAME}}
Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
Address: {{CONTACT_ADDRESS}}

data.headline: Micro Infusion System

steps.text_content: Lightly mist the skin with the hypochlorous acid (HOCL) spray to cleanse and refresh the skin surface before application
Twist open the device, fill it with serum. and close it securely.
Hold the device upside down for about 2 minutes, allowing the serum to evenly saturate the micro-needle tips.
Gently press the device onto the skin using a stamping motion. Work across the face or neck with light, even pressure.
steps.original_filename: Step 4 Sc Tap On Face V2sv2.mp4

steps.text_content: Apply any remaining serum to the face and neck
Apply the calming mask as the final step to support skin comfort

Softened appearance  of expression lines
Imaging shows a softening in the appearance of fine lines, particularly across expression-prone areas such as the forehead and eye contour, contributing to a smoother-looking skin surface.

More even-looking complexion
Skin analysis images show reduced contrast in the appearance of freckles and uneven pigmentation, supporting a more uniform-looking skintone.

Observed improvement in visible pore definition 
Skin analysis images show a reduction in the appearance of enlarged pores, with skin texture appearing smoother and more refined across treated areas.

items.title: How does Micro-Infusion work?
items.content: Micro-Infusion uses ultra-fine 0.5 mm titanium microneedles to create microscopic channels in the skin. This allows the serum to be delivered more effectively than topical application, helping skin absorb active ingredients where they can work best.

items.title: When will I see the results?
items.content:
Skincare results vary by individual. Most users notice an immediate boost in radiance and hydration, with skin looking fresher and more refined within 1â€“2 days after treatment. With regular use, results build progressively â€” including smoother texture, softer fine lines, and improved overall skin quality.

This makes Micro-Infusion an ideal pre-event treatment, especially when performed one or two days before important occasions.

items.title: Is there any downtime?
items.content: There is little to no downtime for most users. Skin may appear slightly flushed immediately after use, which typically subsides within a short period.

items.title: How often should I use the micro-infusion system?
items.content:
The system is designed for periodic use, not daily skincare.
Most routines incorporate it once every 1-2 weeks, depending on skin condition and comfort.

items.title: Is the treatment painful?
items.content: The sensation is minimal and generally described as a light pinprick or tingling feeling. The ultra-fine 0.5 mm titanium microneedles and controlled stamping design are intended to keep the experience gentle when used as directed. Most users find the sensation easy to tolerate and quickly adjust once the treatment begins.

items.title: Can i use it with my existing skincare products?
items.content: Yes, The system is designed to complement your current routine, not replace it. You can continue using your regular cleanser, moisturizer, and sunscreen as usual.

items.title: Are the micro-needles head reusable?
items.content:
No, each needle cartridge is designed for single-use only.
After each session, it is strongly advised to dispose of the used needle head properly to maintain optimal hygiene and effective treatment results.

items.title: When is the best time to do micro-infusion?
items.content:
We recommend performing the treatment in the evening, before bedtime.
After treatment, avoid sun exposure and makeup for 24 hours, allowing your skin to fully absorb the serum and recover optimally.

items.title: What are the serum ingredients?
items.content: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Copper Tripeptide-1, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sclerotium Gum, Sodium DNA(PDRN), Tranexamic Acid, Saccharide Isomerate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Lycium Barbarum Callus (Goji Exosome) Culture Extract, Isomalt, Lecithin, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid

items.title: Can you use it around the eyes, lips and on the neck?
items.content: Yes. The Micro-Infusion System is safe to use on delicate areas, including the under-eye area, lips, and neck. Itâ€™s an effective way to address concerns such as fine lines, eye bags, loss of firmness, and sagging skin in areas that need extra care.

items.title: Is it safe for sensitive or allergy-prone skin?
items.content:
The formula is designed to be gentle and skin-compatible. However, if you have highly sensitive skin or known allergies, we recommend performing a patch test before use or consulting a healthcare professional. 
Avoid use on irritated, broken, or compromised skin.

items.title: Why should not use this system?
items.content:
Avoid use if you:
  â€¢ Have active skin infections or open wounds
  â€¢ Are experiencing severe skin irritation
  â€¢ Have been advised against microneedling-type treatments by a professional.
When in doubt, consult a skincare professional before use.

policy_content.about-us:
We develop clinic-inspired skincare systems designed for controlled, cosmetic use at home, with a focus on safety, precision, and repeatability. 
Our work is guided by established dermatologic principles and a commitment to responsible product design. 

Purpose & Rationale 
Conventional topical skincare primarily acts on the skin surface, while professional procedures such as microneedling are performed in clinical settings under controlled conditions. 
Our objective was to bridge this gap by designing a system that applies the same biological mechanisms used in clinical microneedlingâ€”micro-stimulation and enhanced deliveryâ€”in a gentler, consumer-appropriate format. 
The result is a structured at-home routine that emphasizes control, consistency, and user understanding, rather than intensity. 

Design & Safety Principles 
  • Every component of our system is developed according to the following principles: Controlled micro-stimulation using ultra-fine, short-length needles intended for cosmetic use 
  • Single-use, sterile components to reduce cross-contamination and variability
  • Vertical stamping mechanics designed to minimize skin dragging or tearing Measured delivery of bioactive formulations, released only during use 
 
The system is designed to be repeatable, predictable, and non-aggressive when used according to instructions.
policy_content.refund-policy:
Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}

At {{BRAND_NAME}}, we want you to feel confident about your purchase. If you change your mind, you may return the product unused and in its original, unopened condition within {{REFUND_DAYS}} days of delivery for a refund.

---

1. Return Eligibility

1.1 Eligible Returns

To be eligible for a return, your item must be:

  • Within {{REFUND_DAYS}} days of delivery
  • In its original, unopened condition
  • In original packaging with all accessories, manuals, and inserts
  • Not damaged by external factors (misuse, accidents, improper handling)

1.2 Promotional and Bundle Purchases

If you purchased items as part of a promotion, bundle, or set, all items in the bundle must be returned together to qualify for a refund.

---

2. Non-Refundable Items

The following items are not eligible for refund:

  • Opened or used products
  • Products without original packaging
  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable products or digital content
  • Items marked as "Final Sale" or "Non-Returnable"
  • Personalized or customized items
  • Free promotional items (must be returned with the qualifying purchase)
---

3. Fees

3.1 Original Shipping Fees

Original shipping, taxes, and handling fees are non-refundable.

3.2 Return Shipping

Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item is defective or we made an error.

3.3 Restocking Fee

A restocking fee of {{RESTOCKING_FEE}} may apply for returns that are not in original condition or are missing original packaging.

---

4. How to Request a Return

Step 1: Contact Us

Email us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} with:

  • Your order number
  • Reason for return
  • Photos of the product (if applicable)

Step 2: Receive Return Authorization

We will review your request and provide a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number within 2-3 business days.

Important: Do not return items without an RMA number. Unauthorized returns may be refused or delayed.

Step 3: Ship Your Return

Pack the item securely in its original packaging and ship to:

{{RETURN_ADDRESS}}

Include your RMA number on the outside of the package.

Step 4: Refund Processing

Once we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund within {{REFUND_PROCESSING_DAYS}} business days. Refunds will be issued to your original payment method.

Note: It may take an additional 5-10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement, depending on your financial institution.

---

5. Refund Methods

5.1 Original Payment Method

Refunds are typically issued to your original payment method:

  • Credit/Debit Card: Refund to the card used
  • PayPal: Refund to PayPal account
  • Bank Transfer: Refund to original bank account

5.2 Buy Now Pay Later (Klarna, Afterpay, etc.)

Orders placed using Buy Now Pay Later services may receive store credit only instead of a refund to the payment service.

5.3 Store Credit

In some cases, you may choose to receive store credit instead of a refund. Store credit does not expire and can be used on future purchases.

---

6. Exchanges

We currently do not offer direct exchanges. To exchange an item:

  • Return the original item for a refund

  • Place a new order for the desired item

    • This ensures faster processing and guarantees availability of your desired product.

    ---

    7. Damaged or Defective Items

    7.1 Reporting Damage

    If you receive a damaged or defective product, please contact us within 7 days of delivery at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}} with:

    • Your order number
    • Photos of the damage
    • Description of the issue

    7.2 Resolution

    For damaged or defective items, we will:

    • Send a free replacement, OR
    • Issue a full refund including shipping costs

    You will not be charged for return shipping on defective items.

    7.3 Warranty

    Our products are covered by a {{WARRANTY_MONTHS}}-month warranty against manufacturing defects. This warranty does not cover:

    • Normal wear and tear
    • Damage from misuse or accidents
    • Unauthorized modifications

    ---

    8. Order Cancellation

    8.1 Before Shipment

    You may cancel your order before it ships by contacting us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}. If we can cancel before dispatch, you will receive a full refund.

    8.2 After Shipment

    Once an order has been dispatched, it cannot be canceled. You will need to wait for delivery and then follow the return process.

    ---

    9. Late or Missing Refunds

    If you haven't received your refund after the expected time:

  • Check your bank account or credit card statement again
  • Contact your credit card company or bank (processing times vary)
  • If you've done all of this and still have not received your refund, contact us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}

    • ---

    10. International Returns

    10.1 Return Shipping

    International customers are responsible for return shipping costs and any customs fees.

    10.2 Customs Duties

    If customs duties were charged on your original order and the package is returned, those fees are non-refundable as they are collected by customs authorities.

    10.3 Refused Packages

    If you refuse delivery of a package or fail to pay customs duties, any fees incurred will be deducted from your refund.

    ---

    11. Sale Items

    Items purchased on sale or with discount codes are eligible for return under the same terms as regular-priced items, unless marked as "Final Sale."

    ---

    12. Contact Us

    Questions about returns or refunds? Contact us:

    {{COMPANY_NAME}}
    Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
    Website: {{WEBSITE_URL}}

    ---

    We appreciate your business and are committed to your satisfaction. If you have any concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.
policy_content.privacy-policy:
Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}

{{BRAND_NAME}} ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, store, and safeguard your information when you interact with our website(s), products, devices, subscriptions, applications, and related services (collectively, the "Services").

By accessing or using our Services, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

---

1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

1.1 Information You Voluntarily Provide

We may collect personal information you provide directly, including:

  • Name
  • Email address
  • Phone number
  • Shipping and billing address
  • Payment information (processed securely by third-party payment processors; we do not store full payment card details)
  • Account login credentials
  • Subscription preferences
  • Communications with customer support
  • Reviews, testimonials, images, videos, or other user-generated content

1.2 Automatically Collected Information

When you use the Services, we may automatically collect:

  • IP address
  • Device type, operating system, browser type
  • Pages visited, time spent, interaction behavior
  • Referring URLs
  • Cookies, pixels, and similar tracking technologies

1.3 Skin, Beauty & Preference Information (Non-Medical)

You may voluntarily provide information related to:

  • Skin type, skin concerns, or cosmetic preferences
  • Product usage feedback
  • Self-reported lifestyle or routine preferences

Important clarification:

  • This information is not medical data
  • We do not collect or store protected health information (PHI)
  • Such data is used solely for cosmetic personalization and experience enhancement
---

2. AI-DRIVEN PERSONALIZATION & SKIN PROFILING

If our Services include AI-powered features (e.g., quizzes, recommendations, routines, progress tracking):

  • AI outputs are cosmetic and informational only
  • AI suggestions are not medical advice
  • AI systems operate on user-provided inputs and usage data
  • Outputs are probabilistic and not guaranteed

We may use anonymized or aggregated data to:

  • Improve algorithms
  • Enhance product recommendations
  • Optimize customer experience

You may opt out of certain personalization features at any time.

---

3. MICRO-INFUSION DEVICE & PRODUCT DATA DISCLAIMER

Our at-home skincare devices (including micro-infusion tools):

  • Do not transmit biometric or physiological data
  • Do not collect diagnostic or health signals
  • Do not monitor medical conditions

Any usage data collected (if applicable) relates only to:

  • Product engagement
  • Usage frequency
  • Customer experience improvement
---

4. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

We use your information to:

  • Process and fulfill orders
  • Manage subscriptions and accounts
  • Provide customer support
  • Deliver personalized cosmetic experiences
  • Send transactional and promotional communications
  • Improve products, Services, and marketing performance
  • Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
  • Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
---

5. COOKIES, ANALYTICS & ADVERTISING

We use cookies, pixels, and similar technologies to:

  • Enable essential site functions
  • Remember user preferences
  • Analyze traffic and performance
  • Deliver relevant advertising

Third-party partners (e.g., analytics and advertising platforms) may collect information according to their own privacy policies.

You may control cookies through browser settings; disabling cookies may affect functionality.

---

6. SMS, WHATSAPP & INSTANT MESSAGING COMMUNICATIONS

If you opt in to SMS, WhatsApp, or other messaging services:

  • You consent to receive transactional and promotional messages
  • Message frequency may vary
  • Message and data rates may apply
  • You may opt out at any time by following unsubscribe instructions (e.g., replying "STOP")
We do not share phone numbers with third parties for their own marketing purposes.

---

7. SHARING OF INFORMATION

We do not sell your personal information.

We may share data with:

  • Payment processors
  • Shipping and logistics partners
  • Email, SMS, and messaging service providers
  • Analytics and advertising partners
  • Customer support platforms
  • Legal or regulatory authorities when required
All third parties are contractually required to protect your data and use it only for authorized purposes.

---

8. USER-GENERATED CONTENT & TESTIMONIALS

If you submit reviews, testimonials, images, or videos:

  • You grant us a royalty-free, worldwide, perpetual license to use this content for marketing and promotional purposes
  • Any personal information included may be publicly visible
  • Testimonials reflect individual cosmetic experiences, not typical or guaranteed results
---

9. DATA RETENTION

We retain personal data only as long as necessary to:

  • Provide the Services
  • Meet legal, accounting, or compliance requirements
  • Resolve disputes and enforce agreement

Data may be anonymized or aggregated for long-term analytical use.

---

10. DATA SECURITY

We implement reasonable technical, administrative, and organizational safeguards to protect your information.

However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

---

11. CROSS-BORDER DATA TRANSFERS

Your information may be processed or stored outside your country of residence, including in the United States or other jurisdictions with different data protection laws.

We implement appropriate safeguards to ensure lawful international data transfers where required.

---

12. YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS

Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate information
  • Request deletion of your data
  • Object to or restrict processing
  • Withdraw consent for marketing
Requests can be submitted via the contact details below.

---

13. CALIFORNIA PRIVACY RIGHTS (CPRA)

California residents have the right to:

  • Know what personal data is collected
  • Request deletion of personal data
  • Opt out of certain data sharing
We do not sell personal information as defined by California law.

---

14. EU / UK (GDPR)

For users in the EU or UK:

  • Lawful bases include consent, contract necessity, and legitimate interests
  • You may lodge complaints with your local data protection authority
---

15. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY

Our Services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age.
We do not knowingly collect data from children.

---

16. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
Changes will be posted with a revised "Last Updated" date.

---

17. CONTACT US

For privacy-related inquiries:

{{BRAND_NAME}}
Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}


Address: {{CONTACT_ADDRESS}}

7.2 Customs Delays

International packages may be held by customs for inspection. We are not responsible for delays due to customs processing.

7.3 Refused Packages

If you refuse delivery or fail to pay customs duties:
